pinning.pinnedDescription: The Marketplace is now your default homepage.
pinning.unpinnedDescription: The Dashboard is now your default homepage.

auth.title: Authentication Required

hero.title: Grow Your Agricultural Network with {appName}
hero.subtitle: Connect, trade, and learn with stakeholders across the agricultural supply chain. From farm to fork, {appName} is your trusted partner for growth and sustainability.

features.title: Powerful Features, Seamless Experience
features.subtitle: Everything you need to thrive in today's agricultural landscape, all in one place.

networking.title: Professional Networking
networking.description: Connect with farmers, buyers, suppliers, and experts. Build your professional network and discover new opportunities.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products, from fresh produce to heavy machinery. A secure platform for local and international trade.

forums.title: Community Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, ask questions, and collaborate with peers on topics like sustainable practices and market trends.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Find skilled labor or offer your expertise. Connect with opportunities for farm management, operations, and more.

forWho.title: A Platform for the Entire Supply Chain
forWho.description: {appName} is designed to empower every stakeholder in the agricultural ecosystem, fostering collaboration and creating value at every step.

farmers.title: Farmers & Cooperatives
farmers.description: Access new markets, get fair prices, learn sustainable practices, and connect with suppliers and financial services.

buyers.title: Buyers & Traders
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable products directly from producers. Find reliable partners and manage your supply chain efficiently.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, from agronomy and finance to logistics and technology, to a targeted audience.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating, including a farmer in a field, a person inspecting produce, and someone using a tablet.

cta.title: Join the DamDoh Community Today
cta.subtitle: Ready to transform your agricultural business? Sign up now and start connecting with the future of agriculture.
